mapper.insert:
insert into rss_item (torrent_code, episode_num, rss_manage_id, translation_group, torrent_name, "name", url, homepage, downloaded, pushed,sub_group_id,save_path) values
(#{item.torrentCode}, #{item.episodeNum}, #{item.rssManageId}, #{item.translationGroup}, #{item.torrentName}, #{item.name}, #{item.url}, #{item.homepage}, #{item.downloaded}, #{item.pushed},#{item.subGroupId},#{item.savePath})
